SEARCH
Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.inject

Class PluginServiceLocatorFactory

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.inject.PluginServiceLocatorFactory
public final class PluginServiceLocatorFactory extends Object
A factory for creating and managing service locators for Multiverse plugins. This class handles the initialization and shutdown of service locators and provides methods for registering plugins.

    • get

      public static PluginServiceLocatorFactory get()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the PluginServiceLocatorFactory. Initializes the factory if it has not been initialized.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of PluginServiceLocatorFactory.

      Stops injection of all Multiverse plugins and resets the factory.

    • registerPlugin

      public <T extends org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin> io.vavr.control.Try<PluginServiceLocator> registerPlugin(@NotNull @NotNull PluginBinder<T> pluginBinder)
      Registers a plugin and creates a service locator for it using the base service locator.
      Parameters:
      pluginBinder - The binder for the plugin.
      Returns:
      A Try containing the created PluginServiceLocator.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the factory has not been initialized.
